title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When selecting the dynamic text content type, it does not have any effect on the display of the text
EB: When selecting the dynamic text content type, the text should be displayed in a dynamic and interactive manner
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the settings menu
3. Select the 'Content Type' option
4. Choose the 'Dynamic Text' option
5. Navigate to any page where text is displayed
6. Verify that the text is displayed in a dynamic and interactive manner
